articles.title: Tesla's Cybertruck will go on sale in 2023, says Elon Musk - Engadget
articles.description: The automaker also plans to launch a wide beta of its Full Self-Driving technology in North America this year..
articles.content: Tesla will finally start selling the Cybertruck next year, Elon Musk has announced at the opening party for the company's Giga Texas factory. During his presentation on stage, Musk showed off the pro… [+1768 chars]

articles.title: Matthews sets single-season franchise scoring record, adds OT winner as Maple Leafs top Stars - CBC Sports
articles.description: Auston Matthews set the Toronto Maple Leafs franchise record with his 55th goal in regulation Thursday night in Dallas, then scored No. 56 in overtime to break the record for an American-born player and give the Maple Leafs a 4-3 victory over the Dallas Stars.
articles.content:
Auston Matthews has the most goals ever in a single season for the Toronto Maple Leafs and the most in the NHL by an American-born player.
